org.opensha2.eq.fault.scaling

Class MagAreaRelationship

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensha2.eq.fault.scaling.MagScalingRelationship
      • org.opensha2.eq.fault.scaling.MagAreaRelationship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CA_MagAreaRelationship, Ellsworth_A_WG02_MagAreaRel, Ellsworth_B_WG02_MagAreaRel, HanksBakun2002_MagAreaRel, PEER_testsMagAreaRelationship, Shaw_2007_MagAreaRel, Shaw_2009_MagAreaRel, Shaw_2009_ModifiedMagAreaRel, Somerville_2006_MagAreaRel, WC1994_MagAreaRelationship, WGCEP_2007_PowLaw_MagAreaRel

    public abstract class MagAreaRelationship
extends MagScalingRelationship
    Title:MagAreaRelationship
    Description: This is an abstract class that gives the median and standard deviation of magnitude as a function of area (km-squared) or visa versa. The values can also be a function of rake. Note that the standard deviation for area as a function of mag is given for natural-log(area) not area.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Edward H. Field
